Added palera1n Jailbreak Detection.
Added Blizzard 9 Jailbreak Detection.

(+): Add A Source : now has a few choices. + : Add repo ğŸ“‹ : Copy enabled sources to clipboard for pasting into package managers. If you want all of your sources even if not enabled. Use AutoLists , press its (+) to create your current enabled sources, then turn all on with the green button on top right. Use the (+)Add New Source button on the main page, then select ğŸ“‹(Copy to clipboard). Alive Status : Change how Check If Alive checks repo. (Alive Status) Only active if Check If Alive is enabled. Apply : Force Apply if your not sure.
BackBurners : Added repo status. BackBurners can be emailed via: Contact/Send Backups on the â“˜ Info page.
Check if Alive Status : Added to Settings, choose which type. If repo was down but now live again, its switch handle will be green temporarily. Read the -How To- Page in app.
Settings : Added Enable/Disable the Are you sure alert for the Info page. Tested Respringâ€™s / UserSpace / ldrestart / Safe Mode / UICacheâ€™s
Sync Devices : Repositories can now be syncâ€™d via Replace or Merge. BackBurners can now be syncâ€™d via Replace or Merge.
Open Package Manager : Cydia, Installer, PostBox, Saily, Sileo
Squashed some ğŸğŸœğŸ›ğŸ•·ğŸ¦Ÿ â€˜s.
Please Note: v933.1500-0 -> 1631.x has not been tested fully on an actual iOS 15+ A14+ jailbroken device.

Please Note: Future CSources2 versions will remove 32bit support. Please install the correct version for your device. v933.1510.0-x = 32 bit support for iOS 9.3.3 -> 15.1.0 etc. Some features as listed below will never work on iOS 9 etc. v1100.1620.0-x = 64bit support for iOS 11 -> 16.2.0 etc All listed features should work.
Working On : Removing Cydia as the main manager handler. Allowing app to function completely for any future package manager.
iOS 15.0.0 support.
Please Note: CSources2 1500-0 has not been tested on an actual JB device. Awaiting proper JB, as files/folders/etc structure is unknown. This particular version will be replaced if needed.
This version does support iOS 14.8 JailBreaks.
iOS 14.7.1 support.
Added ability to Import Parcility.co repo Sources. â“˜ Info page -> Import.

Added (ğŸ”N) to Quick Keys. (Return all Repos with keywords in Notes.) Start a search using the ğŸ” on the main page. Type what to look for. Press the (ğŸ”N) Quick Key. It will display only repositories containing the search criteria if found in the Notes section.
Modified Clean and its Settings.
Improved Sync Devices. (version specific).

Fixed, Zebra crashing. (New Zebra does not regenerate its db file.) If on newer version of Zebra 1.1.12? and up. (Iâ€™m not sure ğŸ¤”) In CS2 settings, turn OFF : Push To Zebra Force db If on lower version of Zebra 1.1.12? and down. (Iâ€™m not sure ğŸ¤”) In CS2 settings, turn ON : Push To Zebra Force db
Fixed, iPad2, iPhone4s etc on iOS 9.3.3,.5,.6 crash.
CS2 Cache has been rewritten. On the first run of this update, Be patient.
Squashed some ğŸğŸœğŸ›ğŸ•·ğŸ¦Ÿ â€˜s
iOS 14.6.0 support.
Added line #â€™s if viewing .list files in File viewer. Useful when troubleshooting duplicate repoâ€™s from other .list files via Cydia log, etc.
iOS 14.5.1 support.

Added: Installed Packages (Batchomatic, BackupAZ, Cybackup, PkgBackup, etc. Alternative) View currently installed packages. Displays ALL installed packages. Packages with Î© symbol are mostly required packages, or packages that do not contain the Name: tag. (GoR) Generate a txt, html, or .cipf restore file. iCloud Required. html, currently disabled. (beta) (GoR) Restore previously installed package(s). iCloud Required. Restores from any device containing a .cipf file in CSources2 iCloud /Install Packages/ folder. Displays packages that are not installed on device per loaded .cipf file. Delete a .cipf file from iCloud. Email list of installed packages. Save an installed packages list as .txt file. (stored in CSources2 Inbox folder) View package data, files, etc.
Back Burners will now display activity if repo is alive again.
Paid/Commercial repoâ€™s now display : ğŸ’³
Speed Improvements.
Donate will appears once per upgrade/downgrade. Please help out, itâ€™s a lot of work. ğŸ¤“
Bug Fixes.
iOS 14.4.2 support.
Will also work on iOS 14.5.x (unpack deb, update control file to iOS 14.5.?, repack, use Filza to install)
Bug Fixes. Specific iPad models are crashing when using the share inside CSources2 browser. Use the (CS2) menu item instead.
Share Extension improvements.
Added source hijack (In-App Browser).
Share Extension improvements.
Fix : iCloud backup occurring even if disabled.
Fix : Add Repo Via Share/CS2 would not add until the next time CS2 re-opened.
Bug Fixes.
Added Share Extension: Add repo address
Added Share Extension : Download/Import .list .sources
Add Share Extension : Download/Import .cxpt .plist .json
Speed increase where itâ€™s needed most.
Odyssey Support bug.
Import Cydia : will now look for Zebra, Sileo sources to import.
Added Back Burners.
Fixed deprecated Browser.
Add repo via Browser.
Improved JSON file parsing.
Added more swipe gestures.
Import Friends list; ie, cxpt can now be imported directly via Browser, will also open the Import Friends List page for you.
iOS 14.2.1 Support.
Browser now has ğŸ”— instead of Google. (more to come)
Fix : Multisync Color Scheme Cancel bug.
Fix : crash when syncing.
Fix : if CacheState.plist file is missing.
iOS 13.5 Support.
Ready for iOS 14. (allow install up to iOS 14.0.1)
Removed Jailbreak detection support for Sileo & Zebra.
Added Sileo, Zebra Support.
Fixed CSources2 ability to Re-Spring, UICache, ldrestart, Safe Mode.
Restore : Fast As Possible, 100* faster, practically immediate.
Added the ability to remove hijacks for known Package Managers.
Fixed Crash search on/off.
Jailbreak Detection on the Info page. If it doesnâ€™t display, then CS2 is semi-supported for that particular jailbreak.
Fixed iOS 12.4.1 and below back button issue.
Added the ability to import json files in Import Friends List.
Added Start Over, day 0.
Enabled Auto Dark Mode setting for Notched devices. Intended for users who enable auto dark/light or set dark light in ios Settings. (Notched devices status bar was remaining dark with dark status.)
Reset Preferences file, incorrect group/user.
Known issues: CSources2 Re-spring broken, use Power App etc. instead.
iOS 9.3.3-13.3.1 unc0ver / checkra1n supported. Currently as long as the jailbreak is using sources.list.d folder for its sources.
Added Multi Delete.UI
Updated the Apply, now remembers.
GUI inprovments.
Added Packages Refresh Counts Reminder feature. Look at How To or Read blog for full details.
Updated Activity indicators.
StatusBar correction for dark mode.Added Dark/Light Mode Theme. Not yet complete.
Added Cydia Tweaks Page.
Icon Retrieval Update now leaves existing icon until a new one is found.

iOS 6.0.0-13.2.3 Support, Utilizing checkra1n exploit. Possible unc0ver.

UI Modifications.
iOS 6.0.0-13.x.x Support, posibile 13.2.3 & 13.3.
iPad7,5 - 7,6 - 7,11 - 7,12 - 11,3 - 11,4 - 8,7 - 8,8 - 11,1 - 11,2 Support.
iPhone12,1 - 12,3 - 12,5 Support.
CSources2 now shows repos that are already loaded into Cydia. If source is in Cydia, the source will be disabled in CSources2 and will have an orange tint. Improved MultiSync.
Added Mark As IsSafe/UnSafe.
Added option to reset all settings via Settings. Also added optionÂ via the +(add new source) , type resetcs2defaults as if you were adding a new source.
Please note, when attempting to open a terminal app via CSources2, if the developer of the installed terminal app does not have a URLScheme for its app, then CSources2 cannot open it.
Webview improvements.
Fixed SlideOver/Splitview.
AutoSave improvements
New Settings.
Fixed open in app / safari.
XS Max,Â 11, 11Pro, 11ProMaxÂ etc compatibility.
Fixes for User Icons.
Improved icon download timing.
Auto Scrolling to new sources etc, improvements.
Browser now has static history(beta). By default, CS2 does not remember sites in Browser, turn on Static History, this can be flushed in settings.
User can mark a source as Safe (IsSafe) or UnSafe.
Currently fully tested on unc0ver (Undecimus-v3.7.0.b3), Cydia64_1.1.32~b22.
Backgrounding has been improved to allow coming back and forth or sidebyside integration.
App Colors features / color theming improvements.
And much more.....
bug fix, if toggling repo on/off while searching &on or &off, search would crash.
Re-written from scratch. New look, New everything.
Second Initial Release
